Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the definition of "educational institution"
Summary: Relates to the definition of "educational institution"; adds a new subdivision defining "educational institution" and prohibits specified discriminatory practices by such institutions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the definition of the term "educational institution" and unlawful discriminatory practices for educational institutions
